item.title: Papers
item.description: (*=corresponding author) Journal [SCIS]: Hai Jin, and Jiang Xiao*, Towards Trustworthy Blockchain Systems in the Era of “Internet of Value”: Development, Challenges, and Future Trends. In Science China Information Science (SCIS), 2021, https://doi.org/10.1007/s11432-020-3183-0. [IoTJ]: Jian Chang, Junpei Ni, Jiang Xiao*, Xiaohai Dai, Hai Jin. (JCR Q1, IF: 9.936) [FCS]: Chaofan Wang, Xiaohai Dai, Jiang Xiao*, Chenchen Li, Ming Wen, Bingbing Zhou, and Hai Jin.

item.title: Patents
